description.narrative: Within the Project the Institute for Youth Development KULT is implementing the following components: 1. Empowering local youth CSOs through sub-granting 2. Training program Learn Think and Act! (UMiD) 3.The Academy for Youth Political Leaders 4.Training program for Youth Officers 5.Public advocacy campaigns 6. Supporting youth entrepreneurship through sub-granting 7. Promotional and visibility activities These components (under which groups of activities are implemented) are a level below the 3 "outcome" levels or pillars including the following: 1. Improved conditions for democratic accountability to young people and their participation in civic and political processes, including the promotion of free elections. 2. Young women and young men have, to a greater extent, the same power to shape society and their own lives. 3. Increased trust and reconciliation among young people in all parts of BiH.

Ungdomsorganisationer har en nyckelroll när det gäller att uttrycka och formulera ungdomars prioriteringar, behov och intressen. Insatsen syftar till att stärka ungdomar och ungdomsledare för en mer inkluderande demokratisk process.
Youth CSOs play a key role in voicing youth priorites, needs and interests. The contribution aims at empowering youth and youth leaders for a more inclusive democratic process

tag.narrative: 16.6 - Bygga upp effektiva och transparenta institutioner med ansvarsutkrävande på alla nivåer.
16.6 - Develop effective, accountable and transparent institutions at all levels.

Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Convention to Combat Desertification
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Adaptation
Aid Targeting the Objectives of the Framework Convention on Climate Change - Mitigation
Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: The KULT project has achived all technical goals of the cooperation. This has also been verified independently by an evaluation. In summary these were the main achievements: -Several local strategies for youth have been adopted or are in the process of development and 7 local youth councils formed during the life of the project and through its support. -Young people participating in KULT's training programs have been elected in municipal councils, and cantonal assemblies; -At least 40% women particpated in all of KULT's activities (trainings and LCIs) has been achieved -Over 50 initiatives implemented in more than 30 local communities over the past three years (5 out of 6 leaders of initiatives are female) 5 activities developed to promote fight against GBV -More than 100 youth leaders and young politicians trained over the past 3 years -More than 100 youth officers completed trainings over the past three years -Approx 10 advocacy campaigns completed successfully -Broad outreach achieved (approx. 1500 young people directly participated in initiatives implemented by youth leaders over the past three years) Over 1000 media reports were published on KULT's activities -Updated statistical research on youth issues was made in cooperation with Ministry of Civil Affairs
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
